name: Bridal Mehndi

name: Arabic Mehndi
description: Arabic mehndi is a stylish and modern form of henna art that features bold floral patterns, vine-like trails, and spaces between designs, making it look elegant yet simple. It is commonly used for festive occasions and casual events.
serviceHighlights: Natural Ingredients: Chemical-free henna with a smooth application.
Time Required: 1.5 to 3 hours for full hands.
Price Range: ₹1,500 to ₹5,000, based on design and coverage.
Customization: Features bold floral patterns, vine-like structures, and spaced-out designs with minimal detailing.
Long-Lasting Stain: Dark brown stain that lasts up to one week.

name: Western/Minimal Mehndi
